Panel.Background {
    Position = (5%, 10%);
    Size = (75%, 60%);

    Renderer {
        BackgroundColor = None;
        BorderColor = black;
        Font = "../fonts/Square.ttf";
        TextureBackground = "../textures/menu/ButtonMid.png" Smooth;
        TransparentTexture = true;
    }

    Panel.Category {
        Position = (5%, 10%);
        Size = (20%, 80%);

        Renderer {
            BackgroundColor = None;
            BorderColor = black;
            TextureBackground = None;
            TransparentTexture = false;
        }

        Button.Audio {
            Position = (3.5%, 0);
            Size = (92%, 13%);
            Text = Audio;
            TextSize = 13;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
                BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;
                BackgroundColorDown = #EBEBEB;
                BackgroundColorHover = white;
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                BorderColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
                BorderColorDown = black;
                BorderColorFocused = #1E1EB4;
                BorderColorHover = black;
                Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                TextColor = #448ACC;
                TextColorDisabled = #448ACC;
                TextColorDown = None;
                TextColorFocused = #4BCC3D;
                TextColorHover = None;
                Texture = "../textures/menu/ButtonTop.png" Smooth;
                TextureDisabled = None;
                TextureDown = None;
                TextureDownFocused = None;
                TextureDownHover = None;
                TextureFocused = "../textures/menu/ButtonTopFocused.png" Smooth;
                TextureHover = "../textures/menu/ButtonTopHover.png" Smooth;
            }
        }

        Button.Controls {
            Position = (3.5%, 13%);
            Size = (88.5%, 13%);
            Text = Controls;
            TextSize = 13;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
                BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;
                BackgroundColorDown = #EBEBEB;
                BackgroundColorHover = white;
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                BorderColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;

                Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                TextColor = #448ACC;
                TextColorDisabled = #448ACC;

                TextColorFocused = #4BCC3D;
                TextColorHover = None;

                TextureDownHover = None;
                TextureFocused = "../textures/menu/ButtonMidFocused.png" Smooth;
                TextureHover = "../textures/menu/ButtonMidHover.png" Smooth;
            }
        }

        Button.Back {
            Position = (0, 39%);
            Size = (92%, 13%);
            Text = Back;
            TextSize = 13;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
                BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;

        Button.HUD {
            Position = (3.5%, 26%);
            Size = (88.5%, 13%);
            Text = HUD;
            TextSize = 13;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
                BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;
                BackgroundColorDown = #EBEBEB;
                BackgroundColorHover = white;
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                BorderColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
                BorderColorDown = black;

                Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);

                TextureFocused = "../textures/menu/ButtonMidFocused.png" Smooth;
                TextureHover = "../textures/menu/ButtonMidHover.png" Smooth;
            }
        }
    }

    ScrollablePanel.SettingsPanel {
        ContentSize = (0, 0);
        Position = (25%, 10%);
        Size = (70%, 80%);

        Renderer {
            BackgroundColor = None;
            BorderColor = black;
            TextureBackground = None;
        }

        ScrollablePanel.HUDPanel {
            ContentSize = (0, 0);
            Size = (100%, 100%);
            Visible = false;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = None;
                BorderColor = black;
                TextureBackground = None;
            }

            Label.Label4 {
                HorizontalAlignment = Center;
                Position = (2%, 19%);
                Size = (34%, 14%);
                Text = "Aim Opacity";
                TextSize = 13;

                Renderer {
                    BackgroundColor = transparent;
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                    TextColor = #448ACC;
                    TextureBackground = None;
                }
            }

            Label.Label5 {
                HorizontalAlignment = Center;
                MaximumTextWidth = 120;
                Position = (1%, 33%);
                Size = (40%, 14%);
                Text = "Network Infromation";
                TextSize = 13;

                Renderer {
                    BackgroundColor = transparent;
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                    TextColor = #448ACC;
                    TextureBackground = None;
                }
            }

            Label.Label3 {
                HorizontalAlignment = Center;
                Position = (2%, 5%);
                Size = (34%, 14%);
                Text = "Aim configuration";
                TextSize = 13;

                Renderer {
                    BackgroundColor = transparent;
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                    TextColor = #448ACC;
                    TextureBackground = None;
                }
            }

            Slider.AimConfiguration {
                ChangeValueOnScroll = true;
                InvertedDirection = false;
                Maximum = 3;
                Minimum = 0;
                Position = (40%, 5%);
                Size = (55%, 5%);
                Step = 1;
                Value = 0;

                Renderer {
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    BorderColorHover = black;
                    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                    TextureThumb = "../textures/menu/Thumb.png" Smooth;
                    TextureThumbHover = None;
                    TextureTrack = "../textures/menu/Slider.png" Smooth;
                    TextureTrackHover = None;
                    ThumbColor = #F5F5F5;
                    ThumbColorHover = white;
                    TrackColor = #F5F5F5;
                    TrackColorHover = white;
                    TransparentTexture = true;
                }
            }

            Slider.AimOpacity {
                ChangeValueOnScroll = true;
                InvertedDirection = false;
                Maximum = 255;
                Minimum = 0;
                Position = (40%, 19%);
                Size = (55%, 5%);
                Step = 1;
                Value = 0;

                Renderer {
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    BorderColorHover = black;
                    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                    TextureThumb = "../textures/menu/Thumb.png" Smooth;
                    TextureThumbHover = None;
                    TextureTrack = "../textures/menu/Slider.png" Smooth;
                    TextureTrackHover = None;
                    ThumbColor = #F5F5F5;
                    ThumbColorHover = white;
                    TrackColor = #F5F5F5;
                    TrackColorHover = white;
                    TransparentTexture = true;
                }
            }

            CheckBox.NetworkInformation {
                Position = (45%, 33%);
                Size = (height, 6%);
                TextSize = 13;

                Renderer {
                    BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
                    BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;
                    BackgroundColorHover = white;
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    BorderColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
                    BorderColorFocused = #1E1EB4;
                    BorderColorHover = black;
                    Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
                    CheckColor = #3C3C3C;
                    CheckColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
                    CheckColorHover = black;
                    TextColor = #3C3C3C;
                    TextColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
                    TextColorHover = black;
                    TextDistanceRatio = 0.2;
                    TextureChecked = None;
                    TextureCheckedDisabled = None;
                    TextureCheckedFocused = None;
                    TextureCheckedHover = None;
                    TextureUnchecked = None;
                    TextureUncheckedDisabled = None;
                    TextureUncheckedFocused = None;
                    TextureUncheckedHover = None;
                }
            }
        }

        ScrollablePanel.AudioPanel {
            ContentSize = (0, 0);
            Size = (100%, 100%);

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = None;
                BorderColor = black;
                TextureBackground = None;
            }

            Label.Label1 {
                HorizontalAlignment = Center;
                Position = (2%, 5%);
                Size = (34%, 14%);
                Text = "Music volume";
                TextSize = 13;

                Renderer {
                    BackgroundColor = transparent;
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                    TextColor = #448ACC;
                    TextureBackground = None;
                }
            }

            Slider.MusicSlider {
                ChangeValueOnScroll = true;
                InvertedDirection = false;
                Maximum = 100;
                Minimum = 0;
                Position = (40%, 5%);
                Size = (55%, 5%);
                Step = 1;
                Value = 100;

                Renderer {
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    BorderColorHover = black;
                    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                    TextureThumb = "../textures/menu/Thumb.png" Smooth;

                    TextureTrackHover = None;
                    ThumbColor = #F5F5F5;
                    ThumbColorHover = white;
                    TrackColor = #F5F5F5;
                    TrackColorHover = white;
                }
            }

            Label.Label2 {
                HorizontalAlignment = Center;
                Position = (2%, 19%);
                Size = (34%, 14%);
                Text = "Sound volume";
                TextSize = 13;

                Renderer {
                    BackgroundColor = transparent;
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                    TextColor = #448ACC;
                    TextureBackground = None;
                }
            }

            Slider.SoundSlider {
                ChangeValueOnScroll = true;
                InvertedDirection = false;
                Maximum = 100;
                Minimum = 0;
                Position = (40%, 19%);
                Size = (55%, 5%);
                Step = 1;
                Value = 100;

                Renderer {
                    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                    BorderColorHover = black;

                    TextureThumb = "../textures/menu/Thumb.png" Smooth;

                    ThumbColor = #F5F5F5;
                    ThumbColorHover = white;
                    TrackColor = #F5F5F5;
                    TrackColorHover = white;
                }
            }
        }

        ScrollablePanel.ControlsPanel {
            ContentSize = (0, 0);
            Size = (100%, 100%);
            Visible = false;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = None;
                BorderColor = black;
                TextureBackground = None;
            }
        }
    }
